description: A set of service endpoints used by the viewer

proxyUrl.description: An optional proxy to be used for dealing with same-origin issues.  URL must either be a relative path on the same server or an absolute path on a server which sets CORS headers.

exportMapUrl.description: An ESRI service endpoint for generating map images.  Should point directly to an endpoint that can be consumed by ESRI PrintTask.

geometryUrl.description: A URL to an ESRI ArcGIS geometry service REST endpoint.

googleAPIKey.description: Google API key to enable geo location and share link shortening.

search.description: Search properties including ability to disable certain types of searches (NTS, FSA, and/or LAT/LNG) and to set service endpoint urls

disabledSearches.description: Disable specific types of searches including NTS, FSA, or LAT/LNG

isSelected.description: Indicates if the component is selected and included in the export graphic.

isSelectable.description: Indicates if the component can be included or excluded from the export graphic by the user.

value.description: Value to be passed to the generation function of this export component.

showInfoSymbology.description: Indicates whether symbology from info sections should be included in export legend

showControlledSymbology.description: Indicates whether symbology from controlled layers should be included in export legend

footnote.description: Foot notice to add to exported map
